thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-GoPro Announces Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.41

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GoPro Announces Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.41
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - GoPro Inc:
* GOPRO ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* QTRLY REVENUE $ 334.8 MILLION VERSUS $540.6 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.41 * QTRLY GAAP-GROSS MARGIN 23.8 PERCENT VERSUS 39.2 PERCENT
* QTRLY ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.30 * QTRLY NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 24.8 PERCENT VERSUS 39.5 PERCENT
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.11, REVENUE VIEW $340.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* IN 2018 CO TARGETING NON-GAAP OPERATING EXPENSES BELOW $400 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
